data.client_settings: Im using Oct 18 2018 Changelog [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 30033, Version Hash: 9d25a52474116409
data.actual_result: It crashes the Server or Discord Client or it makes Discord lag like hell
data.expected_result: If it doesn't exist then.. Great someone has fixed it.
data.short_description: When spamming some emojis as example 👌 multiple times in the same message, Discord Crashes
data.steps_to_repro: - Hold shift and spam as many emojis (Works best with the same one i use 👌) untill you almost have 2000 character limit (doesn't have to be the limit as long its a lot of emojis) - Copy & Paste - Now Paste Send Paste Send Pase Send (in a server) and so on....
